DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center , observational study design assess real world effectiveness safety paritaprevir/r - ombitasvir dasabuvir ( 3DAA [ direct-acting antiviral agent ] ABBVIE REGIMEN ) without ribavirin ( RBV ) participants chronic hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) genotype 1b ( GT1b ) infection compensate liver cirrhosis Russia .
DOC.brief_title: Real World Evidence Effectiveness Paritaprevir/r - Ombitasvir , + Dasabuvir Without Ribavirin Participants With Chronic Hepatitis C Compensated Liver Cirrhosis Russian Federation
